description:
This module covers Intellectual Property (IP) Management and Commercialization in the context of a knowledgebased economy. It is designed to equip policy makers with a general knowledge of IP, how it is protected in law and
how IP may be properly managed and commercialized by businesses so that IP may become one of the key drivers for wealth and value creation in a knowledge-based economy.
title: Knowledge-based Economy and Intellectual Property Management
